title: Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd Spurts 7.06%, S&P BSE Finance index Gains 2.2% - Business Standard
content: Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd Spurts 7.06%, S&P BSE Finance index Gains 2.2%  Business Standard
description: Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd has added 18.21% over last one month compared to 11.16% gain in S&P BSE Finance index and 10.31% rise in the SENSEX
